meanings.definition: Make a long, low sound expressing physical or mental suffering or sexual pleasure.
meanings.sent1: The puppy moaned when it hurt its paw.
meanings.sent2: She moaned with delight as she ate the delicious cake.
meanings.sent3: The cat moaned dramatically when it couldn't reach its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The wind moaned through the trees on the stormy night.
meanings.sent5: The old house moaned as it settled in the quiet evening.

meanings.definition: Complain or grumble in a low voice.
meanings.sent1: He moaned about having to do his chores.
meanings.sent2: The students moaned quietly when they got extra homework.
meanings.sent3: She moaned playfully about having to wait in line for ice cream.
meanings.sent4: The engine moaned as the car struggled up the steep hill.
meanings.sent5: The toddler moaned about having to go to bed early.
